OCD.name: Layout Parameters
OCD.description: Select the property labels. NOTE: Edge and Node properties may appear together, and not all properties are suitable for all values. Numeric properties work in all cases, and non-numeric properties should only be used with shape and color options

AD.name: Node Size
AD.description: The label for the node size property

AD.name: Edge Size
AD.description: The label for the edge size property

AD.name: Node Color
AD.description: The label for the node color property

AD.name: Edge Color
AD.description: The label for the edge color property

AD.name: Ring Color
AD.description: The label for the ring color property

AD.name: Node Shape
AD.description: The label for the node shape property
